pkgmetadata.longdescription: Hyperband for 'mlr3' // Implements hyperband method for hyperparameter tuning. Various termination criteria can be set and combined. The class 'AutoTuner' provides a convenient way to perform nested resampling in combination with 'mlr3'. The hyperband algorithm was proposed by Lisha Li, Kevin Jamieson, Giulia DeSalvo, Afshin Rostamizadeh and Ameet Talwalkar (2018) arXiv:1603.06560.
